channel.title: Nick Maludy on Encore Technologies - DevOps Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Nick Maludy on Encore Technologies - DevOps Blog

item.title: New Blog
item.description: Welcome to the Encore DevOps blog! We on the DevOps team have been working for about a year and a half building tons of automation solutions for Encore’s Managed Services customers. Up until we haven’t had a place to publicly showcase the more technical work that we’ve been doing. This blog serves as a new space for our engineers to share their experiences around new an innovating technologies we’re exploring.
